Line13.7FA05: I hope that old bear pulls through, but he has the right of it: focus on the greater threat. Find Lilith.
Line7.7FA05: Is there anything we can do to help him?
Line9.BAE4: I'm not sure yet, but he’s more concerned with Lilith than his own fate.
MenuLabel: “Lilith has cursed Nafain—and, through him, driven the land to madness.”
VoiceDir13.7FA05: Confident, as if he has made a decision about the best course of action.
